TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ProfileMigrateEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class ProfileMigrateEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class ProfileMigrateEventArgs sealed : EventArgs

summary.span: 提供 類別之 事件的資料。

span.span: Provides data for the event of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會提供事件資訊至事件的類別。The object provides event information to the event of the class. 物件提供存取權目前的要求和匿名的設定檔中的匿名使用者識別碼的屬性。The object provides access to the of the current request and the anonymous user identifier for the anonymous profile in the property. 您可以使用事件，以複製設定檔屬性值從匿名設定檔的已驗證的設定檔已以匿名方式使用您的應用程式的使用者登入時。You can use the event to copy profile property values from an anonymous profile to an authenticated profile when a user who has been anonymously using your application logs in. 具有已啟用的使用者設定檔的應用程式啟動時，ASP.NET 會建立新類別的型別`ProfileCommon`，該項則繼承自類別。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 當`ProfileCommon`產生類別，根據在 Web.config 檔案中，指定的設定檔屬性`GetProfile`方法會加入可讓您擷取`ProfileCommon`物件會根據使用者名稱。When the `ProfileCommon` class is generated, based on the profile properties specified in the Web.config file, a `GetProfile` method is added that enables you to retrieve a `ProfileCommon` object based on a user name. 您可以使用`GetProfile`要擷取的屬性值的匿名的設定檔的目前設定檔的方法。You can use the `GetProfile` method of the current profile to retrieve the property values of the anonymous profile. 匿名的屬性值可以再複製到目前已驗證之使用者的設定檔。The anonymous property values can then be copied to the current profile for the authenticated user. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示 Web.config 檔案，可讓匿名驗證和ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中所包含的事件。The following code examples show a Web.config file that enables anonymous authentication and the event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application. 下列程式碼範例顯示 Web.config 檔案，可讓匿名識別和支援匿名使用者的設定檔屬性。The following code example shows a Web.config file that enables anonymous identification and profile properties that support anonymous users. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中所包含的事件。The following code example shows the event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application. 事件將設定檔屬性值從匿名的設定檔複製到目前使用者的設定檔。The event copies profile property values from the anonymous profile to the profile for the current user. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/VB/global.asax#1)]

span.span: The anonymous identifier being migrated from.

summary.span: 建立 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Creates an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立的執行個體類別，設定屬性來指定，並設定屬性，以指定`anonymousId`。The creates an instance of the class, sets the property to the specified , and sets the property to the specified `anonymousId`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AnonymousID As String
public: property System::String ^ AnonymousID { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得匿名設定檔的匿名識別項，以從該設定檔移轉設定檔屬性值。

span.span: Gets the anonymous identifier for the anonymous profile from which to migrate profile property values.

value.span: 匿名設定檔的匿名識別項，以從該設定檔移轉設定檔屬性值。

span.span: The anonymous identifier for the anonymous profile from which to migrate profile property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含匿名使用者的唯一識別碼。The property contains the unique identifier for an anonymous user. 當使用者已經在使用您的應用程式以匿名方式登入時，您可以處理事件，以複製設定檔屬性值從使用者的匿名設定檔他或她已驗證的設定檔。When someone who has been using your application anonymously logs in, you can handle the event to copy profile property values from the user's anonymous profile to his or her authenticated profile. 具有已啟用的使用者設定檔的應用程式啟動時，ASP.NET 會建立新類別的型別`ProfileCommon`，該項則繼承自類別，並包含 Web.config 檔中指定的設定檔屬性。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class and includes profile properties specified in the Web.config file. 當`ProfileCommon`產生類別時，`GetProfile`方法會加入可讓您擷取`ProfileCommon`物件會根據使用者名稱。When the `ProfileCommon` class is generated, a `GetProfile` method is added that enables you to retrieve a `ProfileCommon` object based on a user name. 您可以使用`GetProfile`要擷取的屬性值的匿名的設定檔的目前設定檔的方法。You can use the `GetProfile` method of the current profile to retrieve the property values of the anonymous profile. 匿名的屬性值可以再複製到目前已驗證之使用者的設定檔。The anonymous property values can then be copied to the current profile for the authenticated user. 請參閱複製匿名的屬性值的範例的第二個程式碼範例。See the second code example for an example of copying anonymous property values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示 Web.config 檔案，可讓匿名驗證和ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中所包含的事件The following code examples show a Web.config file that enables anonymous authentication and the event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application 下列程式碼範例顯示 Web.config 檔案，可讓匿名識別和支援匿名使用者的設定檔屬性。The following code example shows a Web.config file that enables anonymous identification and profile properties that support anonymous users. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中所包含的事件。The following code example shows the event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application. 事件將設定檔屬性值從匿名的設定檔複製到目前使用者的設定檔。The event copies profile property values from the anonymous profile to the profile for the current user. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/VB/global.asax#1)]
